main event: A UFO was observed resembling a flame, exhibiting erratic motion across the horizon in Downers Grove, Illinois.
interesting points: The object was described as short and about the size of a coin at arm's length., It moved in a jerky, erratic fashion for approximately 20 seconds or less., The object was first observed at an angle of 120 degrees over an invisible aircraft., The object disappeared on the horizon., The entire sighting lasted for 30 seconds or less.
